faqs.question: Is your cat food really 100% halal?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely! All our products are certified halal by recognized Islamic authorities. We ensure that every ingredient, from the chicken and tuna to the vitamins and minerals, meets strict halal standards. Our manufacturing process is also halal-compliant, with no cross-contamination with non-halal products.

faqs.question: What makes your cat food different from others?
faqs.answer: Our cat food stands out because it's 100% halal, made with premium natural ingredients, and formulated by veterinary nutritionists. We use high-quality protein sources (chicken or tuna), no artificial preservatives, and include essential vitamins and minerals. Plus, we cater specifically to the Muslim community's values and dietary requirements.

faqs.question: What are the main ingredients?
faqs.answer: Our formulas contain high-quality protein (chicken or tuna), chicken liver for nutrients, fish oil for Omega-3, essential vitamins (A, D, E, B-complex), minerals (calcium, phosphorus, zinc), and natural fiber. We never use artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.

faqs.question: Is this suitable for kittens and adult cats?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer formulations suitable for both kittens and adult cats. Our kitten formula supports healthy growth and development, while our adult formula maintains optimal health and vitality. Check the product labels for specific age recommendations.

faqs.question: Do you deliver to all UAE emirates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we deliver to all seven emirates: Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah, Umm Al Quwain, and Fujairah. Shipping is free for all orders, and delivery typically takes 1-3 business days depending on your location.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: Currently, we accept Cash on Delivery (COD) for all orders across the UAE. We're working on adding online payment options including credit/debit cards and digital wallets soon.

faqs.question: How should I store the cat food?
faqs.answer: Store the food in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. After opening, seal the bag tightly or transfer to an airtight container. Use within 4-6 weeks of opening for optimal freshness. Refrigeration is not necessary but can extend shelf life.

faqs.question: How much should I feed my cat?
faqs.answer: Feeding amounts depend on your cat's weight, age, and activity level. Generally, adult cats need about 200-300 calories per day. Our packaging includes a detailed feeding guide. Start with the recommended amount and adjust based on your cat's body condition. Always provide fresh water.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If your cat doesn't love our food or if you're not satisfied for any reason, you can return unopened bags for a full refund. For opened bags, please contact our customer service to discuss your concerns - we're committed to your satisfaction.

faqs.question: Does the food contain common allergens?
faqs.answer: Our formulas are grain-free and don't contain wheat, corn, or soy - common allergens for cats. We use single-source proteins (chicken or tuna) to minimize allergic reactions. However, if your cat has specific allergies, please check the full ingredient list or consult your veterinarian.
